album.title: Stomp The Yard (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)

track.name: The Champ
comments: His most commercial track ever and it's STILL BLOODCLAART FIRE.

True story: Dispatch sends my fire company to a typical smoke alarm call at a church around the corner.  We arrive to find an enormous party with people pouring out into the street and alarms blazing.  Soon enough we find Ghostface and his crew smoking up backstage (which triggered the alarm) getting ready to perform.  He was cool as hell and snapped some photos with us haha.  He also signed the smoke detector which sadly we had to put back.
Bangin ass shit nigga!!!! Fresh as a muthafucka!!!!
not a fan of scott storch, GFK all the way though!
REALNESS. flow. cadence. wordplay. production. it works perfect all together. WU
